name: Carlo Van de Roer - Modulator One

metadata.name: Recollection 1
metadata.description:
This image is automatically generated upon being collected, using multiple source images of the same photographed moment under different lighting conditions. Your unique wallet address acts like 'DNA' in co-authoring this image with me. Once created, the work resides in permanent storage.  
This process will take a few minutes, after which refreshing metadata will reveal the image.  
I think of these as different recollections of the same moment. My goal with this work is to capture a past moment and experience its mutable, authorable nature collaboratively with you.  
The development of this work can be viewed in the interactive video piece in this same collection.  
Created in camera with the use of new photographic technology enabling a moment to be recorded under multiple lighting conditions concurrently -- in collaboration with Satellite Labâ€™s PlateLight technology.
